column5: Welcome to Parisian Retreat where elegant accomodations and friendly hospitality are combined. Onsite host is former Parisian, experienced International Travel professional, and entertaining social organizer, who could assist you with any travel & entertainment need. Welcome drink, and daily breakfast with coffee, juice, water, eggs and snacks are included. $ 25 one way pick up or drop off from/to Austin ABIA airport or $40 round-trip for pickup and drop off.
